destinations.title: Paris, France
destinations.description: The romantic capital of the world, home to the Eiffel Tower, exquisite art, and charming cafés.

destinations.title: Tokyo, Japan
destinations.description: A buzzing metropolis where cutting-edge technology meets serene temples and cherry blossoms.

destinations.title: Cape Town, South Africa
destinations.description: Spectacular landscapes with Table Mountain, pristine beaches, and vibrant culture.

destinations.title: Sydney, Australia
destinations.description: A coastal city famous for its Opera House, stunning beaches, and laid-back vibe.

destinations.title: New York City, USA
destinations.description: The city that never sleeps, packed with iconic landmarks and a diverse food scene.

destinations.title: Rome, Italy
destinations.description: An eternal city filled with ancient ruins, Renaissance art, and vibrant street life.

destinations.title: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: A tropical paradise known for its beaches, rice terraces, and spiritual heritage.

destinations.title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
destinations.description: A vibrant city famous for its carnival, Sugarloaf Mountain, and Copacabana beach.

destinations.title: Barcelona, Spain
destinations.description: A cultural hotspot renowned for Gaudí's architecture, tapas bars, and sunny beaches.

destinations.title: Dubai, UAE
destinations.description: A futuristic city in the desert, home to the world's tallest building and luxury shopping.

destinations.title: Amsterdam, Netherlands
destinations.description: Picturesque canals, vibrant tulips, and world-class museums make Amsterdam unforgettable.

destinations.title: Istanbul, Turkey
destinations.description: A melting pot of cultures, where East meets West amid stunning mosques and bazaars.

destinations.title: Prague, Czech Republic
destinations.description: Medieval streets, Gothic cathedrals, and charming bridges make Prague a fairy tale city.

destinations.title: Santorini, Greece
destinations.description: White-washed houses, deep blue seas, and breathtaking sunsets await in Santorini.

destinations.title: Zurich, Switzerland
destinations.description: Nestled among mountains, Zurich blends financial prowess with lakeside serenity.

destinations.title: Vienna, Austria
destinations.description: Imperial palaces, classical music, and cozy coffeehouses define Vienna's charm.

destinations.title: Seoul, South Korea
destinations.description: A futuristic skyline meets ancient temples and vibrant street food in Seoul.

destinations.title: Bangkok, Thailand
destinations.description: A bustling capital filled with ornate temples, floating markets, and street food.

destinations.title: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
destinations.description: Skyscrapers, street food, and the iconic Petronas Towers make Kuala Lumpur shine.

destinations.title: Vancouver, Canada
destinations.description: Surrounded by mountains and sea, Vancouver is a haven for outdoor lovers.

destinations.title: Lisbon, Portugal
destinations.description: Colorful streets, seaside charm, and soulful Fado music make Lisbon unforgettable.

destinations.title: Moscow, Russia
destinations.description: Stunning architecture, historic Red Square, and rich culture define Moscow.

destinations.title: Athens, Greece
destinations.description: The cradle of Western civilization, featuring ancient ruins and vibrant markets.

destinations.title: Buenos Aires, Argentina
destinations.description: The Paris of South America, known for tango, steak, and grand architecture.

destinations.title: Cairo, Egypt
destinations.description: Explore ancient pyramids, bustling markets, and the mighty Nile River.

destinations.title: Reykjavík, Iceland
destinations.description: Stunning landscapes, the Northern Lights, and geothermal wonders await here.

destinations.title: Hanoi, Vietnam
destinations.description: A blend of ancient temples, bustling streets, and serene lakes in Vietnam's capital.

destinations.title: Lima, Peru
destinations.description: A coastal city with rich history, culinary delights, and nearby ancient wonders.

destinations.title: Edinburgh, Scotland
destinations.description: Medieval castles, dramatic landscapes, and literary festivals enrich Edinburgh's charm.

destinations.title: Doha, Qatar
destinations.description: A blend of futuristic architecture, desert landscapes, and rich Arabian culture.
